title: If there is no data for a series, it should display a friendly error message to remind the user
OB: When a chart is created and the data definition is set, selecting a column without data
EB: When a chart is created and the data definition is set, if a column without data is selected, a friendly error message should be displayed to remind the user
SR: 1. Create a chart and set the data definition. 2. Select a column without any data.
